channel.title: Comments on: Creating a baseline for SQL Server

item.description: Hi, Ted. Did you get a chance to upload the SSIS?
item.content:encoded: Hi, Ted. Did you get a chance to upload the SSIS?

item.title: By: Tarun Kumar Jaiswa;
item.dc:creator: Tarun Kumar Jaiswa;
item.description: Hi, Great post! Could you suggest any third party tool for baselining a SQL server? Also, Is your SSIS ready?
item.content:encoded: Hi, Great post! Could you suggest any third party tool for baselining a SQL server? Also, Is your SSIS ready?

item.title: By: Dirk Hondong
item.dc:creator: Dirk Hondong
item.content:encoded:
Hi Ted,

I have to mention it: awesome post.

Any new news regarding your SSIS solution?

Regards
Dirk

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.content:encoded:
Based on the requests I’ve startd working on the SSIS solution that is freely placed without much configuration needs. Once done it will be placed on Codeplex and LessThanDot

I will post back when it is completed. ðŸ™‚ Thank you for all the great feedback!

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.content:encoded:
Nice post, read it some time ago and would be interested in seeing the SSIS package, any chance of posting it.

Regards

Andrew

item.title: By: jimmya
item.dc:creator: jimmya
item.description: Any update on posting this package?

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.content:encoded:
Thank you all ðŸ™‚

I’ll try to get the SSIS package up for the basic baseline collection in the forums by the end of the week.

item.content:encoded: another great post Ted. Always good to get insight into how other people do things.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Nice post, of course a lot of people don't care about baselines or monitoring until they encounter problems, then suddenly they are very very interested.
item.content:encoded: Nice post, of course a lot of people don’t care about baselines or monitoring until they encounter problems, then suddenly they are very very interested.
